experience.description: Developed a web application to help LaboControl promote its services and expand its product reach beyond the BTP ecosystem. Implemented a digital store enabling the sale of unused or surplus products, streamlining the sales process and increasing market visibility.
achievements: Enabled online promotion of company services, reaching a wider audience
Set up a digital store for surplus products, creating new sales opportunities

experience.description: Contributed to Valhko‚Äôs microservices-based platform by unifying authentication across services via the API Gateway, integrating Post and Feed services into the new front-end, and implementing media upload and rendering through Azure Blob Storage. Designed and developed the AI Agent Service microservice to enable secure agent interactions, integrated the AI assistant model (Arya) into the front-end using Django and the drag system, and connected it to back-end services. Also supported sprint tasks such as career-workspace, career-insights, and Arya v2 deployment, as well as contributing to the implementation of an API Key Management system for secure agent APIs.

projects.title: üè® Hotel Sentiment Analysis API üåü
projects.description: This project is a sentiment analysis API that predicts whether a hotel is recommended based on user comments. It uses machine learning to classify comments as positive or negative and provides an overall recommendation.

projects.title: ETL Pipeline Sant√©
projects.description: This project implements a robust ETL pipeline for processing, analyzing, and monitoring healthcare data. Using Apache Airflow, the extraction, transformation, and loading steps are efficiently orchestrated. Data is collected from a production database, cleaned, and aggregated before being stored in an analytical database. To ensure transparency and pipeline monitoring, Prometheus and StatsD are used to collect system and application metrics, while Grafana provides real-time visualization of system performance and health. Finally, Apache Superset offers interactive dashboards to explore and analyze healthcare data, facilitating data-driven decision-making.

projects.title: üì° Pipeline Telecom
projects.description: This project presents a fully integrated data pipeline tailored for telecom operations, covering the entire lifecycle of telecom event processing ‚Äî from real-time data generation to final interactive visualization. The pipeline simulates how telecom companies process call data records (CDRs), price them based on business rules, store billing information, and provide stakeholders with dynamic insights through dashboards. By leveraging modern big data technologies such as Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, PostgreSQL, and Streamlit, the project demonstrates a practical application of distributed data processing in a near real-time context.

projects.title: ü¶∑ Dental Pathology Classification
projects.description: ü¶∑ Dental Pathology Classification with Supervision via Docker, Prometheus, and Grafana. This project presents an intelligent web application for the automatic classification of dental pathologies from images, enhanced by real-time monitoring of system and application metrics using Prometheus and Grafana. The entire setup is orchestrated through Docker Compose, ensuring easy and reproducible installation and management.
